snippet: White, a two-time Olympic gold medalist in the snowboarding halfpipe, will get a chance to win one in slopestyle after taking the second of two qualifying events in Mammoth Lakes, Calif.
abstract: Shaun White, two-time Olympic gold medalist in the snowboarding halfpipe, will get a chance to win one in slopestyle at Sochi after taking the second of two qualifying events in Mammoth Lakes, Calif.
lead_paragraph: White, a two-time Olympic gold medalist in the snowboarding halfpipe, will get a chance to win one in slopestyle after taking the second of two qualifying events in Mammoth Lakes, Calif.

headline.main: Shaun White Qualifies for Slopestyle in Sochi
headline.print_headline: White Qualifies for Slopestyle in Sochi
